Detailed Description

Creates functions from their name for joint-joint optimization.

template<typename T >
boost::shared_ptr< T > roboptim::retargeting::JointFunctionFactory::buildFunction ( const std::string &  name)

Instantiate a function from its name.

This method creates a function (cost or constraint) from its name.

Parameters:
[in]namefunction name
Returns:
shared pointer to the newly created function
Template Parameters:
Tfunction type (e.g. DifferentiableFunction)

References roboptim::retargeting::detail::JointFunctionFactoryMapping< T >::Mapping::factory, and roboptim::retargeting::detail::JointFunctionFactoryMapping< T >::Mapping::name.

std::vector< std::string > roboptim::retargeting::JointFunctionFactory::listFunctions ( ) [inline, static]

List supported functions.

Each element of this string can be passed to buildFunction method to create the corresponding function.
